Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.resource

Class AbstractResource

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.resource.AbstractResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, Circuit, Favourite, Message, Order, ResourceList, User
public abstract class AbstractResource extends Object implements Resource
Provides a base implementation for Resource classes.
Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Manuel Rigobello (manuel.rigobello@studenti.unipd.it)

  • Method Details

    • toJSON

      public void toJSON(OutputStream out) throws IOException
      Converts the resource object to JSON format and writes it to the provided output stream. This method is responsible for serializing the resource object into JSON format.
      Specified by:
      toJSON in interface Resource
      Parameters:
      out - The output stream to which the JSON data will be written.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while writing JSON data, or if the output stream is null.

    • writeJSON

      protected abstract void writeJSON(OutputStream out) throws Exception
      Performs the actual writing of JSON. Subclasses have to implement this method to provide the actual logic needed for representing the Resource to JSON.
      Parameters:
      out - the stream to which the JSON representation of the Resource has to be written.
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong during writing.
